page.title: 01TOURISM-GOTHAM VILLAGE
page.content: Gotham is a picturesque and peaceful place with lots of charming people.It has quite a few shops,such as a newsagents,3 hair salons,a wool and clothes shop and 4 food shops.It also has a number of public houses.There are a mixture of different houses,some new and some old and there are two thatched properties.The village is surrounded by hills and woods and there are lots of farms.There are many sporting facilities,such as the tennis courts,bowling green and football and cricket clubs.They are all near the park. There are lots of facilities for children , like the youth club, brownies, guides and cubs. There are also facilities for the elderly. In the village there is a church and a chapel. Opposite the church is a pump which has been there for many years.
